name: CMAuthorizationStatus
desc: The authorization status for motion-related features.

items.name: case notDetermined
items.desc: The status has not yet been determined.

items.name: case restricted
items.desc: Access is denied due to system-wide restrictions.

items.name: case denied
items.desc: Access was denied by the user.

items.name: case authorized
items.desc: Access was granted by the user.
